patriarch noun [C]
(FAMILY/SOCIETY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a powerful man in a family: In the movie, Williams plays the part of the family patriarch. The patriarch, Joseph P. Kennedy, died in the autumn of 1969.
the male leader of a society in which power passes from father to son: Ancient patriarchs abided by the rules set by Buddha Shakyamuni. The patriarch of the Sunni community appeared on television to appeal for calm. Compare
